name: One Golden Sword
description:
NOW ENJOY AN EPIC SWORD THROWING GAME!!

This is my submission for GMTK 2019 Game Jam. The theme is: 'only one'

"ONE SWORD, ONE MINUTE, ONE LIFE"

In my game, you have to find the only golden sword in one minute. 

(Try breaking my record of 32 seconds)

HOW TO PLAY?
  • WASD or ARROWS to move.
  • Click to shoot.
  • Escape to pause.
  • R to Restart.
  • Don't let enemies touch you!
  • Don't forget to get your sword back after throwing.
